description:
Input channel configuration (analog, digital, or network).

# Internal Type Used for all input types: analog, digital (AES/EBU), and network (Dante). Paths: - `/audio/input/analog/1` - `/audio/input/digital/1` - `/audio/input/network/1`

# Structure - `name`: User-defined channel name (max 31 characters) - `gain`: Input gain adjustment (-12.0 to +12.0 dB) - `delay`: Input delay (0.0 to 1000.0 ms) - `mute`: Channel mute state

# Usage Input channels are simple - just gain/delay/mute. No processing (EQ/FIR). Processing happens in speaker output layers (user/array/preset).
